thread.title: German SPD votes for coalition talks with Merkel

title: German SPD votes for coalition talks with Merkel
text:
German SPD votes for coalition talks with Merkel 6:00pm GMT - 01:38 
Germany's Social Democrats (SPD) voted on Sunday to begin formal coalition talks with Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives, moving Europe's economic powerhouse one step closer to a stable government after months of political deadlock. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Germany's Social Democrats (SPD) voted on Sunday to begin formal coalition talks with Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives, moving Europe's economic powerhouse one step closer to a stable government after months of political deadlock.
